mapper.select: select maCode mainCode, maName mainName from main_class
select subCode, subName from sub_class where maCode=#{mainCode}

select nvl(count(*), 0) from( select mId, r.rNum, LISTAGG(s.subName, ',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY s.subCode) subTypes from member m join resume r on m.mId=r.mId left join intro i on r.rNum=i.rNum join interest_job ij on m.mId=ij.mId join sub_class s on ij.subCode=s.subCode join main_class mc on s.maCode=mc.maCode where resumeType=1
and ()
group by mId, r.rNum, rName )

select mId, r.rNum, LISTAGG(s.subName, ',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY s.subCode) subTypes from member m join resume r on m.mId=r.mId join interest_job ij on m.mId=ij.mId join sub_class s on ij.subCode=s.subCode join main_class mc on s.maCode=mc.maCode where resumeType=1 and r.rNum=#{rNum} group by mId, r.rNum

select m.mId, to_char(mBirth,'YYYY-MM-DD') mBirth, r.rNum, rName, engName, pay, addr, addr2, phone, email, army, intro1, intro2, intro3, intro4 from member m join resume r on m.mId=r.mId left join intro i on r.rNum=i.rNum where r.rNum=#{rNum}
select acName, termtime, memo from resume r join member m on r.mId=m.mId join ability a on m.mId=a.mId join academy ac on a.acCode=ac.acCode where rNum=#{rNum}
select license, expStart, expEnd, liGC from re_license rl left join mem_license ml on rl.liNum=ml.liNum left join license l on ml.liCode=l.liCode where rNum=#{rNum}
select language, laScore from re_language rl left join mem_language ml on rl.laNum=ml.laNum left join language l on ml.lanCode=l.lanCode where rNum=#{rNum}
select prName, expStart, expEnd, memo from re_project rp left join mem_project mp on rp.prNum=mp.prNum where rNum=#{rNum}
select awAgency, awSector, awDate, memo from re_award ra left join mem_award ma on ra.awNum=ma.awNum where rNum=#{rNum}
select company, part, carStart, carEnd, memo from re_career rc left join mem_career mc on rc.mcNum=mc.mcNum where rNum=#{rNum}
